name: ReorderableList
desc: A scrolling container that allows the user to interactively reorder the list items.

fields.name: itemBuilder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.itemBuilder} Called, as needed, to build list item widgets.

fields.name: itemCount
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.itemCount} The number of items in the list.

fields.name: onReorder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.onReorder} A callback used by the list to report that a list item has been dragged to a new location in the list and the application should update the order of the items. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: onReorderStart
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.onReorderStart} A callback that is called when an item drag has started.

fields.name: onReorderEnd
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.onReorderEnd} A callback that is called when the dragged item is dropped.

fields.name: proxyDecorator
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.proxyDecorator} A callback that allows the app to add an animated decoration around an item when it is being dragged. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.padding} The amount of space by which to inset the list contents.

fields.name: dragBoundaryProvider
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.reorderable_list.dragBoundaryProvider} A callback used to provide drag boundaries during drag-and-drop reordering.
